successes.title: Anamanaguchi - make ENDLESS FANTASY more than an album!
successes.description: We just finished a 22-track record over 3 years without help from a label. Help us make Endless Fantasy more than just an album!

Pledges.description: [THANKS] "Meow" & "Planet" MP3 download :)
[POSI VIBES] "Meow" & "Planet" MP3 download & HD "Meow" music video download also thANX!
[.ZIP] Digital pre-order of Endless Fantasy!
[CD] CD pre-order of Endless Fantasy (+ digital download of Endless Fantasy & future collabs)
[CD + POSTER] 11x17 poster designed by Cory Schmitz + CD pre-order of Endless Fantasy (+ digital download of Endless Fantasy & future collabs). Plus a die-cut sticker.

[ENDLESS FANTASY USB DRIVE] A custom iridescent USB drive containing lossless files of ENDLESS FANTASY in it's entirety, plus music videos for the songs "Meow" & "Endless Fantasy". Also, everything else we've ever released from Power Supply to Dawn Metropolis and the summer singles. Also a die-cut sticker of our new logo designed by Andrew Strasser :) + digital pre-order of Endless Fantasy & future collabs
[GUEST T-SHIRT] Limited Kickstarter t-shirt design by SPECIAL SECRET GUEST COLLABORATORS :) + digital pre-order of Endless Fantasy & future collabs.
[VINYL] Vinyl 2xLP pre-order of Endless Fantasy (+ digital download of Endless Fantasy & future collabs), plus a die-cut sticker.
[VINYL] Vinyl 2xLP pre-order of Endless Fantasy (+ digital download of Endless Fantasy & future collabs), plus a die-cut sticker.

****VINYL IS BACK WITH FIXED INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING. Sorry for the downtime! We goofed on the shipping math for the first reward - shipping double LP's is a pretty expensive biz. This way we can be sure we aren't actually LOSING money sending vinyl to you guys :) Thanks for your understanding!
[VINYL + POSTER] Poster designed by Cory Schmitz + 2xLP Vinyl pre-order of Endless Fantasy (+ digital download of Endless Fantasy & future collabs). Plus a die-cut sticker
[TOUR PARTY] Two guest list spots to any of our upcoming headlining shows (festivals excluded). 2 per city! PLEASE CHECK DESCRIPTION TO SEE IF YOUR CITY IS STILL AVAILABLE!

[SIGNED VINYL] Vinyl 2xLP pre-order of Endless Fantasy (+ digital download of Endless Fantasy & future collabs), plus a die-cut sticker. This is just like the old reward except SIGNED BY THE WHOLE BAND n_n (we will also probably cover your record in silver sharpie animals)
[DIGITAL PACKAGE] DIGITAL COPY OF ENDLESS FANTASY, USB FLASH DRIVE, T-SHIRT (GUEST DESIGN), 11x17 POSTER DESIGNED BY CORY SCHMITZ :) PLUS DIE-CUT STICKER & DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF FUTURE COLLABS
[CD PACKAGE] CD COPY OF ENDLESS FANTASY, USB FLASH DRIVE, T-SHIRT (GUEST DESIGN), 11x17 POSTER DESIGNED BY CORY SCHMITZ :) PLUS DIE-CUT STICKER & DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF ENDLESS FANTASY & FUTURE COLLABS

[VINYL PACKAGE] 2xLP VINYL COPY OF ENDLESS FANTASY, USB FLASH DRIVE, T-SHIRT (GUEST DESIGN), 11x17 POSTER DESIGNED BY CORY SCHMITZ! PLUS DIE-CUT STICKER & DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF ENDLESS FANTASY & FUTURE COLLABS

[VINYL PACKAGE] 2xLP VINYL COPY OF ENDLESS FANTASY, USB FLASH DRIVE, T-SHIRT (GUEST DESIGN), 11x17 POSTER DESIGNED BY CORY SCHMITZ! PLUS DIE-CUT STICKER & DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF ENDLESS FANTASY & FUTURE COLLABS ************Vinyl is back with fixed international shipping. Sorry for the downtime! We goofed on the shipping math for the first reward - shipping double LP's is a pretty expensive biz. This way we can be sure we aren't actually LOSING money sending vinyl to you guys :) Thanks for your understanding!

[SONG SOURCE FILES!] We'll send you a random source file of a song on Endless Fantasy! Playable on free software Milkytracker (PC/Mac/Linux), or Famitracker (PC only). Collect them all I guess? We'll do a phone call to discuss the track and how we made it! (+ digital download of Endless Fantasy & future collabs)

[SIGNED VINYL PACKAGE] 2xLP VINYL COPY OF ENDLESS FANTASY, USB FLASH DRIVE, T-SHIRT (GUEST DESIGN), 11x17 POSTER DESIGNED BY CORY SCHMITZ! PLUS DIE-CUT STICKER & DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF ENDLESS FANTASY & FUTURE COLLABS

[TOUR GAME BOY] We'll send you one of our Game Boys that's been with us on tour to play "Mermaid". We'll sign it if you want! (+ USB drive, die-cut sticker & digital download of Endless Fantasy and future collabs)

[SCHOOL OF CHIPTUNE] - It's like Hogwarts but chiptune. Private workshop with all of us! You will be put into different classes of 5, and spend your day at GUCHI SCHOOL. A day-long 20 person seminar where Pete will show you Famitracker, Ary will show you Milkytracker, and Luke will show you LSDJ, James will show you how to mod an NES! Takes place in our studio in NYC - we can't pay for travel. Play around with some of our song files! You will receive an OFFICIAL Bachelor of Chiptune degree certified by a frog. (+ USB drive & digital download of Endless Fantasy and future collabs & poster & t-shirt)

[NES CARTRIDGE] We are making a CUSTOM NES CARTRIDGE full of UNRELEASED SONGS from the past 3 years. PLAYABLE ON ANY WORKING NES CONSOLE, FOR REAL. Comes with ORIGINAL VISUALS by Party Time Hexcellent, coated with IRIDESCENT PAINT, and we will NEVER, EVER, EVER, MAKE THESE EVER AGAIN. This bundle comes with the USB flash drive release of Endless Fantasy. :)

[NES CARTRIDGE + CD] We are making a CUSTOM NES CARTRIDGE full of UNRELEASED SONGS from the past 3 years. PLAYABLE ON ANY WORKING NES CONSOLE, FOR REAL. Comes with ORIGINAL VISUALS by Party Time Hexcellent, coated with IRIDESCENT PAINT, and we will NEVER, EVER, EVER, MAKE THESE EVER AGAIN. This bundle comes with the USB flash drive release of Endless Fantasy. :)
This bundle ALSO comes with the Endless Fantasy CD!

[LIGHT-UP WIRE PANELS] Custom EL wire panels used in "Meow" music video made by James (!!) & Becky at Adafruit Industries (4/4).  Biohazard sign, alien head, kitty cat, and smiley face. One of a kind! Hang it in your bedroom n_n (+ USB flash drive, die-cut sticker & digital download of Endless Fantasy and future collabs)

[TEST PRESSING] Vinyl test pressing signed by the entire band. This was the pressing listened to and approved for manufacturing by Pete Berkman & producer Gabe Liberti. Call us up & tell us what you think. (+ flash drive)

[NES CARTRIDGE] We are making a CUSTOM NES CARTRIDGE full of UNRELEASED SONGS from the past 3 years. PLAYABLE ON ANY WORKING NES CONSOLE, FOR REAL. Comes with ORIGINAL VISUALS by Party Time Hexcellent, coated with IRIDESCENT PAINT, and we will NEVER, EVER, EVER, MAKE THESE EVER AGAIN. This bundle comes with the USB flash drive release of Endless Fantasy. :)
ALSO: 2XLP ENDLESS FANTASY VINYL SIGNED BY THE WHOLE BAND!!

[TOUR NES] One of our custom-modded tour NES' made by James! (we'll sign it if you want!) (+ your choice of vinyl or USB drive, die-cut sticker & digital download of Endless Fantasy and future collabs)

[PERSONAL THEME SONG] We will write you a song to use as your personal theme music forever & ever. We'll chat on the phone to get an idea about you & your vibe, then send us your life story and we'll do our best to convey you in a song. We will chat about what you think it should sound like. IT'S JUST FOR YOU AFTER ALL! (+digital download of Endless Fantasy and future collabs & thank u tweet n_n) ###NOTE: This is for noncommercial use under CC BY-NC-ND 3.0

[ONE-ON-ONE SCHOOL OF CHIPTUNE] - Personal private lessons with all of us! Pete will show you Famitracker, Ary will show you Milkytracker, Luke will show you LSDJ, James will show you how to mod an NES. Takes place in our apartments in NYC - we can't pay for travel. Play around with some of our song files! You will receive an OFFICIAL Masters of Chiptune degree certified by a frog. (+ your choice of vinyl or USB flash drive & digital download of Endless Fantasy and future collabs & poster & t-shirt & die-cut sticker)

[CAT HEAD FROM "MEOW VIDEO"] It's the cat head moot wore from the "Meow" video. BE THE CATMAN! Custom designed! (+your choice of vinyl or USB flash drive & digital download of Endless Fantasy and future collabs & poster & t-shirt & die-cut sticker)

[SONG FOR YOU (BIZ-MODE)] Want music in a more pro context? We'll write you a custom song for your podcast, video game, student movie, lookbook video, etc. To our discretion, limited time offer! (5/5)
